## ThemeParameters variable

This is a simple ThemeParameters control that you can show users, allowing them to tune core theme parameters. It does not expose the background and nominal step properties, but may do so in the future.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ThemeParameters: FC<ThemeParametersProps>
```
